named-query.name: BusinessHeadquarter.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM BusinessHeadquarter b WHERE b.idBusinessHeadquarter = :idBusinessHeadquarter

named-query.name: BusinessHeadquarter.FIND_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT b FROM BusinessHeadquarter b

named-query.name: BusinessHeadquarterProvider.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT bp FROM BusinessHeadquarterProvider bp WHERE bp.idBusinessHeadquarterProvider = :idBusinessHeadquarterProvider

named-query.query: SELECT bp FROM BusinessHeadquarterProvider bp

named-query.name: BusinessHeadquarterStock.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT bs FROM BusinessHeadquarterStock bs WHERE bs.idBusinessHeadquarterStock = :idBusinessHeadquarterStock

named-query.name: BusinessHeadquarterStock.FIND_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT bs FROM BusinessHeadquarterStock bs

named-query.name: Costumer.FIND_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Costumer c WHERE c.idCostumer = :idCostumer

named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Costumer c

named-query.name: Costumer.FIND_BY_DOCUMENT
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM Costumer c WHERE c.document = :doc
